title: Check Existing Product Agreement
description: Implement logic to check if the product already exists in an Agreement when receiving a new license message via the Call Home API. Determine if the existing Agreement Product is either active or inactive.

title: Reactivation of Inactive Agreements
description: If an inactive Agreement Product is found upon reinstallation, reactivate it. Ensure that the status of whether it was initially a trial or not remains unchanged.

title: Maintain Trial and Non-Trial Status
description: Ensure that the existing Agreement Product retains its trial status if it was initially a trial, or its regular status if not, when reinstalling the product. This is to prevent resetting back to a trial period.

title: Preserve Unlocked End Date
description: Ensure the Unlocked End Date for the Agreement is not reset or altered when checking for existing product licenses during reinstallation.
